snippet: Jack Ferver’s “Mon Ma Mes” was performance art delivered with aplomb despite the familiar ground it covered.
abstract: Claudia La Rocco reviews performance-art piece Mon Ma Mes, choreographed and performed by Jack Ferver at the French Institute Alliance Francaise, as part of the Crossing the Line series.
lead_paragraph: Jack Ferver’s “Mon Ma Mes” was performance art delivered with aplomb despite the familiar ground it covered.

headline.seo: Jack Ferver’s ‘Mon Ma Mes,’ at Le Skyroom
headline.main: Telling Almost All, and With a Wink
headline.print_headline: Telling Almost All, and With a Wink
